trans-unit.source: Handles configuration settings for XML serialization of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: Gère les paramètres de configuration pour la sérialisation XML des instances de <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.

trans-unit.source: This class handles the configuration element [<dateTimeSerialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md) found under the [<system.xml.serialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md).
trans-unit.target: Cette classe gère l’élément de configuration [ <dateTimeSerialization> élément](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md) situés sous le [ <system.xml.serialization> élément](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about configuration files, see [Configuration File Schema](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations sur les fichiers de configuration, consultez [Schéma des fichiers de configuration](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.DateTimeSerializationSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.DateTimeSerializationSection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the serialization format.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit une valeur qui détermine le format de sérialisation.

trans-unit.source: This property is used when handling the `mode` attribute of the [<dateTimeSerialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md).
trans-unit.target: Cette propriété est utilisée lors du traitement de la `mode` attribut de la [ <dateTimeSerialization> élément](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md).
